METADATA.DESCRIPTION: A Simple PHP and JSON framework for Web Page and Blogging.

ROOT.TITLE: APHID is simple,
ROOT.CONTENT: Well, a little bit of knowladge is required, just some basic HTML and CSS. Once you build your templates, just add content by copy-pasting and editing JSON files.

ROOT.TITLE: Lightweight,
ROOT.CONTENT: Weights less than 500 KB!!! Bootstrap and Jquery included.

ROOT.TITLE: Scalable,
ROOT.CONTENT: Once you get familiar, you can create more complex templates, or even add Data Bases features. There is no limit.

ROOT.TITLE: Ideal for Bussines Web Pages, Blogging and Portfolios.
ROOT.CONTENT: You want to show your work and your style. this is your starting point.
